metadata.name: Inside of You
metadata.description:
The Universe is not outside of you.
Look inside yourself; everything that you want,
you are already that.
-Rumi
...........................................................................................................
This handmade universe is created entirely by hand using sculptural materials and resin and finally placed on a rotating magnetic base ( you can see the steps of making this Universe on my instagram page ) 
...........................................................................................................
After purchasing this Universe , you can order a number of my galactic jewelry ( you can see that in my instagram page ) and receive it wherever you are in the world.
- The music of this NFT was originally produced by Arian Dousti
